Name: History of Football World Cup
About the game: Story of The Football WorldCups is a game for those who are passionate about puzzles and football. There are more than 20 sliding puzzles to challenge you in different levels of complexity while you are running through 100 years of football world cup stories. Meet world football champions and world cup mascots on a fascinating tour through the football museum. Improve your football knowledge discovering the world cup champions of all time. Remember great moments of joy brought by football world cups. Learn about the History of World Cups and it's champions Solve sliding puzzles that reveals iconic football images
